method: Roll out the pizza dough on a lightly floured surface.
Transfer the dough to a baking sheet.
Spread tomato sauce over the dough, leaving a border around the edges.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese evenly over the sauce.
Sprinkle capers and sliced pepperoni over the cheese.
Drizzle olive oil over the pizza.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Slice the pizza and serve hot.
